data.title: London Stansted Airport (STN)
data.meta_description: If you're departing from London Stansted Airport (STN) then be sure to read our comprehensive airport guide and make your journey easier.
data.text:
Check-in

The airport's check-in area is located on the ground floor of the terminal. Check-in zones are signposted in alphabetical order.

Money Exchange

TTT Moneycorp exchange facilities can be found after security, in the arrivals area and in the Baggage Reclaim Hall.

Business Services

London Luton offers business facilities within the No.1 Lounge located at Gate 49. Here for an entry fee you can enjoy complimentary snacks and drinks as well as Wi-Fi access, payphones and fax. Alternatively there are meeting rooms and conference facilities available in the United Business Centre at Stansted Airport as well as the nearby Hilton and Radisson Blu.

Internet Access

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the terminal for the first 60 minutes per day under the network _stanstedairport. After the recorded time period an access fee will then apply.

Family Facilities

Family rooms and baby changing facilities are located throughout the terminal in departures and arrivals.

Baggage

A baggage storage facility is located at the airport service desk in the International Arrivals landside concourse. You can leave your bags here for Â£10 for 24 hours. BagWrap.Com also offers a baggage wrapping service which can be found at the front of the terminal concourse.

Concierge

Bagport offer a bespoke porter service and assistance for passengers departing and arriving at Stansted Airport.

Showers

You can find free-to-access showers at Stansted Airport in the departure lounge after security and in the arrivals area.

Airport Lounges

Stansted Airport is home to the No.1 Traveller Lounge, located at Gate 49 nearby Ryanair's international flights. For an entry fee, you can enjoy a range of services and facilities including a selection of freshly prepared dishes, complimentary bottled beer, wine and spirits from a fully tended bar, unlimited free Wi-Fi, complimentary items from a self-service pantry as well as entertainment in the form of TV screens, magazines, board games and more.
